page.title: 19A SELSEY GIRL AND HER FAMILY
page.content: I am a normal ten year old girl called {Vicky.}At the weekends I sometimes go swimming,or I ride my bike.I read and, when it is sunny,I sunbathe.My brother {Tristram (13)}likes to play snooker, pool and billiards.He likes his tape recorder,and has got a BMX bike too.My sister{Henny, 14},is always listening to music in her room.She also writes letters to her pen-pal. Henny is a vegetarian.My sister{Bella}who is{16 sleeps in her caravan in our back garden.She practises the guitar.My eldest sister{Georgina,}who is{19, sleeps at my{Granny's}and{Grandpa's up the road.She has just sold her motorbike.My{Dad}works in London at a children's home during the week.He likes carving figures out of wood, which my{Mum}paints. Georgina helps by cooking our dinner.My Mum is painting our front room,and I help her.
